accept_terms.title: Agree to the Databricks JDBC Driver Terms & Conditions
accept_terms.description: You must agree to the Databricks JDBC Driver Terms & Conditions to use this connector.

databricks_personal_access_token.title: Access Token
databricks_personal_access_token.description: Databricks Personal Access Token for making authenticated requests.

database.title: Databricks catalog
database.description: The name of the catalog. If not specified otherwise, the "hive_metastore" will be used.

schema.title: Default Schema
schema.description: The default schema tables are written. If not specified otherwise, the "default" will be used.

enable_schema_evolution.title: Support schema evolution for all streams.
enable_schema_evolution.description: Support schema evolution for all streams. If "false", the connector might fail when a stream's schema changes.

data_source.title: Data Source
data_source.description: Storage on which the delta lake is built.

s3_bucket_name.title: S3 Bucket Name
s3_bucket_name.description: The name of the S3 bucket to use for intermittent staging of the data.

s3_bucket_path.title: S3 Bucket Path
s3_bucket_path.description: The directory under the S3 bucket where data will be written.

s3_bucket_region.title: S3 Bucket Region
s3_bucket_region.description: The region of the S3 staging bucket to use if utilising a copy strategy.

s3_access_key_id.description: The Access Key Id granting allow one to access the above S3 staging bucket. Airbyte requires Read and Write permissions to the given bucket.
s3_access_key_id.title: S3 Access Key ID

s3_secret_access_key.title: S3 Secret Access Key
s3_secret_access_key.description: The corresponding secret to the above access key id.

file_name_pattern.description: The pattern allows you to set the file-name format for the S3 staging file(s)
file_name_pattern.title: S3 Filename pattern

azure_blob_storage_endpoint_domain_name.title: Endpoint Domain Name
azure_blob_storage_endpoint_domain_name.description: This is Azure Blob Storage endpoint domain name. Leave default value (or leave it empty if run container from command line) to use Microsoft native from example.

azure_blob_storage_account_name.title: Azure Blob Storage Account Name
azure_blob_storage_account_name.description: The account's name of the Azure Blob Storage.

azure_blob_storage_container_name.title: Azure Blob Storage Container Name
azure_blob_storage_container_name.description: The name of the Azure blob storage container.

azure_blob_storage_sas_token.title: SAS Token
azure_blob_storage_sas_token.description: Shared access signature (SAS) token to grant limited access to objects in your storage account.

purge_staging_data.title: Purge Staging Files and Tables
purge_staging_data.description: Default to 'true'. Switch it to 'false' for debugging purpose.
